name: Fashion Business: EPISODE 2 part 1
description:
This is a continuation of the adventures of Monica Buckfett, who has lost her business and money. What will she go through before she can regain everything and take revenge on those who caused her such problems? 

Find out her destiny!

This is the 2nd episode of Fashion Business.

The Game stands out due to its interesting plot and beautiful graphics.

The game is available on Patreon.
